creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical object that fills most of the picture plane; a circle in its center consists of interweaving lines; heavier lines around the object's center spiral outwards towards its border
medium: Drypoint, aquatint, and lithograph; state proof
signed: LR: John Newman 1985 / STATE PROOF / ARCHIVE
title: Fold-Out
